import React from "react"; import "./Weather.css"; export default function Weather() { let currentCity = "Berlin"; let temperature = { celsius: 20, fahrenheit: 68 }; let weatherData = { icon: , date: "Tuesday 16 February 15:12", conditions: "Rainy", humidity: 80, wind: 16 }; function handleSubmit(event){ event.preventDefault(); } return (

Weather Forecast

{temperature.celsius} {""} °C {""} | {""} °F
  • {weatherData.conditions}
  • Humidity: {weatherData.humidity}% Wind: {weatherData.wind} Km/H
  • {weatherData.icon}
  • {weatherData.date}
